name: MonoCube
description:
Developed for #GBJAM5 - Rate here please!

With music and sound effects from Lyserdigi (and at least one sound effect made with ChipTone).

The aim is to go to the exit as fast as possible, all while dodging spikes, finding keys and using bounce pads to your advantage.

Controls:

Move --- WASD --- Directional Keys

Speed Up --- Z --- K

Pause --- Escape

Also, be sure to Hack the Palette to choose your favourite Gameboy Palette!
